id.description: Unique identifier for the invocation request (UUID recommended).

version.description: Semantic version for the request envelope schema (major.minor.patch).

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the request is created.

tool.description: Logical tool name or catalog identifier being invoked.

trace_id.description: Optional distributed trace identifier propagated to downstream services.

context.description: Optional contextual metadata supplied by the orchestrator (task id, agent, trace, etc.).

auth.description: Authentication envelope containing credential hints or scoped tokens.

metadata.description: Additional request metadata such as priority, retry counts, or orchestration hints.

payload.description: Tool-specific input payload validated by the tool's input schema.
